title: [Extension Proposal] MongoDB Migration

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

A annotation-based migration extension for MongoDB based on MongoDB java driver tightly integrated into Quarkus framework without using XML/JSON files like in Liquibase or Flyway extension. Furthermore, there should be a possibility to implement tests for each migration.

### Repository name

quarkus-mongodb-migration

### Short description

A annotation-based migration extension for MongoDB based on MongoDB java driver.

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/<REPOSITORY_NAME>/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- mongodb
- mongodb-java


### Team Members

- andlinger
- holzleitner

### Additional context

_No response_
